## `r data[['title']]`  

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
if (length(author)!=0) {
  cat('\n**Author:**', author[[1]], '\n')
}
```

**Created:**  `r Sys.time()`

**Primary Time Series:** `r data[['primarySeriesRaw']][['type']]`

**Secondary Time Series:** `r data[['secondarySeriesRaw']][['type']]`

**Location:**  `r data[['sitefile']][['siteNumber']]` - `r data[['sitefile']][['stationName']]`

**Period:**  `r as.Date(data[['inputs']][['startDate']])` to `r as.Date(data[['inputs']][['endDate']])`

***

par(mar=c(7, 4, 4, 2))
